Interface TasksViewAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
TasksViewApiAdapter
public interface TasksViewAPI
UI-facing abstraction over the TasksViewModel.

The Swing layer depends only on this interface and never touches the DAO or domain model directly. Methods return Void (or DTOs) to keep the view free from checked exceptions.

  • Method Details

    • tasksProperty

      Property<List<ITask>> tasksProperty()
      Returns an observable property of all tasks (unfiltered), suitable for UI binding.
      Returns:
      property containing List<ITask> of all tasks

    • filteredTasksProperty

      Property<List<ITask>> filteredTasksProperty()
      Returns an observable property of tasks after applying the current filter.
      Returns:
      property containing filtered List<ITask>

    • canUndoProperty

      Property<Boolean> canUndoProperty()
      Returns an observable flag indicating whether an undo operation is possible.
      Returns:
      property reflecting undo availability

    • canRedoProperty

      Property<Boolean> canRedoProperty()
      Returns an observable flag indicating whether a redo operation is possible.
      Returns:
      property reflecting redo availability

    • reload

      Void reload()
      Reloads tasks from the persistence layer into the ViewModel.
      Returns:
      null

    • deleteAll

      Void deleteAll()
      Deletes all tasks.
      Returns:
      null

    • deleteTasks

      Void deleteTasks(int... ids)
      Deletes a set of tasks by their identifiers.
      Parameters:
      ids - task identifiers to delete
      Returns:
      null

    • advanceState

      Void advanceState(int id)
      Advances a task to its next legal TaskState.
      Parameters:
      id - task identifier
      Returns:
      null

    • markState

      Void markState(int id, TaskState state)
      Marks a task with an explicit target TaskState.
      Parameters:
      id - task identifier
      state - target state
      Returns:
      null

    • addTask

      Void addTask(ITask task)
      Adds a new task using a UI-level ITask proxy. Implementations extract title, description, and state as needed.
      Parameters:
      task - UI proxy carrying task data
      Returns:
      null

    • updateTask

      Void updateTask(ITask task)
      Updates an existing task using a UI-level ITask proxy. Implementations use task.getId() as the key.
      Parameters:
      task - UI proxy carrying updated task data
      Returns:
      null

    • undo

      Void undo()
      Performs an undo operation if available.
      Returns:
      null

    • redo

      Void redo()
      Performs a redo operation if available.
      Returns:
      null

    • setFilter

      Void setFilter(ITaskFilter filter)
      Applies a composed filter (AND/OR combinator) to the tasks view. Implementations should update filteredTasksProperty() accordingly.
      Parameters:
      filter - combinator filter to apply
      Returns:
      null

    • clearFilter

      Void clearFilter()
      Clears the active filter.
      Returns:
      null

    • setSortStrategy

      Void setSortStrategy(SortStrategy strategy)
      Sets (or clears with null) the sorting strategy used for presentation.
      Parameters:
      strategy - sorting strategy, or null to clear
      Returns:
      null

    • getCountsByState

      ByStateCount getCountsByState(boolean useFiltered)
      Computes counts of tasks by state, optionally on the filtered subset.
      Parameters:
      useFiltered - true to compute on filtered tasks; false to use all tasks
      Returns:
      a ByStateCount report DTO

    • exportTasks

      Void exportTasks(Path path, ExportFormat format, boolean useFiltered, List<Integer> ids)
      Exports tasks to the given path in the requested format.
      Parameters:
      path - target file path
      format - export format (e.g., CSV or TXT)
      useFiltered - whether to export the filtered subset
      ids - optional explicit list of ids to export; may be null or empty
      Returns:
      null

    • exportByStateReport

      Void exportByStateReport(Path path, ExportFormat format, boolean useFiltered, List<Integer> ids)
      Exports a "count by state" report.
      Parameters:
      path - target file path
      format - export format (e.g., CSV or TXT)
      useFiltered - whether to export the filtered subset
      ids - optional explicit list of ids to include; may be null or empty
      Returns:
      null

    • findRowById

      Optional<TasksViewModel.RowDTO> findRowById(int id)
      Finds a task row by its identifier for dialog prefill.
      Parameters:
      id - task identifier
      Returns:
      optional TasksViewModel.RowDTO if found
